Reviews.Title: IT was a great camera
Reviews.Author: Noemi Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I loved it but of course, someone stole it from me one day. Great quality pictures for sure! Would buy another one.

ProductInfo.Features:
Small and light enough to take anywhere
14.1 megapixels - Captures very high quality images, allowing detail-packed enlargements
Fuss-free operation for beginners with simplified controls and easy-to-read on-screen instructions
Fun in-camera image retouching functions including trim and red-eye correction
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Silver DSC-W320 14.1MP Digital Camera
